# First 3 fixed - Use /24 to /32
```
# All the hosts (except 0 and 255) - Use /24
192.168.30.1 - 192.168.30.254
192.168.30.0 255.255.255.0
192.168.30.0/24

# Only one host - Use /32
192.168.30.5 only
192.168.30.5 255.255.255.255
192.168.30.5/32

# The rest is just halving (Make sure to subtract 2)
/24	255.255.255.0	254
/25	255.255.255.128	124
/26	255.255.255.192	62
/27	255.255.255.224 30
/28	255.255.255.240 14
/29	255.255.255.248 6
/30	255.255.255.252 2
/31	255.255.255.254 none
/32	255.255.255.255 1
```
